item.title: Dow left behind as S&P 500 soars to record after record. What gives?
item.description: The S&P 500 is set to score a record finish every day of this past week while the Dow has yet to return to record territory in 2025.

item.title: Is this the Nvidia of nuclear power? The stock has soared almost 400% in the past year.
item.description: NuScale Power has the government support, the technology and the financial backing to succeed. Will that be enough?

item.description: Customers shrugged off higher prices and drove up sales, while AutoNation said it’s well positioned to handle higher tariffs.

item.description: PayPal’s stock is on track to rise for the eighth session in a row, but analysts have a hard time making a call about the future.
